full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: 21301 - 236930 - Request for Standing Offer (OCIR) for the Purchase of Miscellaneous Grocery Products for CSC Housing Units 

**Reference**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) WS3697278636-Doc4666296167

**Date of Publication**: July 11, 2024

**Closing Date and Time**: August 8, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

#### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), invites bids from qualified suppliers for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) to provide miscellaneous grocery products for CSC's Housing Units located in the province of Quebec, Canada.

The tender is seeking a supplier to provide a variety of grocery products, including nuts and seeds, minimally processed meat and poultry products, and other items, as outlined in the solicitation documents. The products will be used in the CSC's Housing Units in Laval and Ste-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec.

#### Requirements and Criteria

The tender requires the selected supplier to provide the products in accordance with the specifications outlined in the solicitation documents. The evaluation criteria will be based on the lowest price.

The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other trade agreements, as applicable.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Selina Ly, DPPC/TPSGC, by email at [selina.ly@tspc tpw.gc.ca](mailto:selina.ly@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Notice URL

The notice can be found at: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20194686?extsite=MjAxOTQ2ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

#### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents, including the RFSO and all relevant information, can be downloaded from the above link.
